name: Macey's Maze
description:
Macey's Maze is a narrative-driven adventure game where your task is to help Macey to win a "maze-race" between her and the Other One... but it is obviously not just that.

W A S D - Move around

Mouse cursor - Look around

Space - Jump

Q - Leave trace behind to help you remembering paths 

E - Place required objects on altars

Esc - Quit to main menu

R - Restart Game

This game was made for the Games Job Live Fall Game Jam 2021.

The theme this time was Leave Something Behind

The time limit was 1 Week.

This was a project that I completed as a solo developer.



Used sound files from these creators : 

Audio_Dread , maarten.tepaske, soundnimja, Aeonemi

Static material blueprint:
https://realtimevfx.com/t/creating-old-tv-style-static/1097/2 - Wyeth
